WorkItem.Description:
The optimizer is giving me worse gear combinations that what I am wearing on my hunter.  I have selected the items I am wearing and several possible upgrades.  After running the optimizer, it tells me it found a gearset with a score of 491 and the gear I have equipped is 939.
 
The optimizer settings are:
Calculation to Optimize: Overall Rating
No additional requirements
Thoroughness is set to max
 
Attached is my character file.  I created a new character file by downloading my hunter from the armory in b16.1.  I have been having the same problem since b16.

Comments.Message: Found the bug; the Optimizer isn't considering the Projectile slot. We'll get it fixed, but for now just equip the projectile again after the optimizer finishes.
I recreated my hunter using the armor and I added the quiver of 1k feathers to my item list.  The optimizer seems to generate better results.
You also have to select projectile and quiver as available otherwise optimizer won't use them.
I did have the projectile selected (mysterious arrow).
Selected as available means that the diamond next to it is not blank. It is not selected as available in the attached character xml.
